goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 525kB)
graph_title: Rate of banks and building societies per 100,000 population
indicator_name: (a) Number of commercial bank branches per 100,000 adults and (b) number of automated teller machines (ATMs) per 100,000 adults
target_name: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all
indicator_available: Number of commercial bank branches per 100,000 adults
computation_calculations: Rate of banks/building societies per 100,000 population = (Number of banks or building societies/total population)*100,000
source_url_text_1: UK Business Counts - local units by industry and employment size band
source_url_text_2: Population estimates - local authority based by single year of age 16+
